title: Lukáš Hlavatý
text: Lukáš Hlavatý (born 16 March 1983) is a Czech <a href="association%20football">football</a> midfielder. He played in the <a href="Gambrinus%20liga">Gambrinus liga</a> for <a href="1.%20FC%20Brno">1. FC Brno</a>. He also played international football at under-21 level for <a href="Czech%20Republic%20national%20under-21%20football%20team">Czech Republic U21</a>.
